title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path.
OB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer does not generate or save the relative path.
EB: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path.
SR:
To reproduce this bug, follow these steps:
1. Open a report design located in the $project/test directory.
2. Include a library from the $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary directory.
